fields: [{"type":"contenter.form.select","name":"background","label":"背景色","value":"grey","defaults":[{"key":"白色","value":"white"},{"key":"灰色","value":"grey"}]},{"type":"contenter.form.extendform","name":"contents","label":"内容","value":[{"icon":"fa fa-futbol-o","title":"this is title","desc":"this isdesc"},{"icon":"fa fa-futbol-o","title":"this is title","desc":"this isdesc"},{"icon":"fa fa-futbol-o","title":"this is title","desc":"this isdesc"}],"fields":[{"type":"contenter.form.text","name":"icon","label":"图标","value":"fa fa-futbol-o"},{"type":"contenter.form.text","name":"title","label":"标题","value":"this is title"},{"type":"contenter.form.text","name":"desc","label":"描述","value":"this is desc"}]}]
template:
<#assign json=Values.contents?eval/> <#list json as item>
${item.title}
${item.desc}
